trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were no other sightings in Austin on or around April 13th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my friend(who will corroborate the event) we driving eastbound on Wells Branch Parkway about to get on N I-35, pulled to a stop at the light of the overpass and saw a bright white circular object moving very fast towards the ground. The was no tail, it was circular in shape, and look to me like some sort or continuous electrical spark. There was light blue and white. No orange, red, or yellow or any color to indicate a flame or combustion. It went overhead VERY fast in a Northeasterly direction and appeared to be falling, or crashing. We continued on the highway, but could see no smoke, flames, or fire. Me and my buddy could not figure out what it was based on the event alone. We kept and eye and ear open for any news on what happened. but have not heard anything since.
